#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

  int t,n;

  scanf("%d", &t);
  for(int i=1; i<=t; ++i)
  {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    vector<int> citire(n);
    for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
      scanf("%d", &citire[i]);

    sort(citire.begin(),citire.end());
    printf("Case %d: %d\n", i, citire[n-1]+citire[n-2]+citire[n-3]);
  }

  return 0;
}
